We are the fastest pre-accounting tool inthe industry. Here is what we do.
Instantly issue virtual and physical p-cards. 
Issue unlimited p-cards for your crew and set limits.
Admins can easily create and track cards for the production and set spend limits per card. Start using our virtual cards right away by adding them to your wallet. No more waiting weeks to get started!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/661ebff368581cbee41c64df_Frame%201000007231.png)
Card and cash expenses all in one place.
Bye-bye, tedious reconciliations on multiple platforms! See all your transactions in one place and easily match them with receipts. Available on both web and mobile.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/661ed1d1e42bf52f1ead9e53_Group%201000008517.png)
Add receipts in minutes, not weeks.
Snap a photo and we parse your receipt. 
Our advanced AI parses your receipts/vendor invoices in different languages and currencies, and files your expenses for you. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65a738fb71c105895eed77ba_Mockup%20copy%204.png)
Instantly create and approve petty cash envelopes digitally.
Crew can add expenses to envelopes in seconds. Admins and approvers can track and approve envelopes anytime, anywhere.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/659f379cc37fd9b5fbaead02_feature-2.png)
Upload invoices, pay vendors, and reimburse crew‚Äîall without logging into your bank.
Get invoice approvals and schedule payments instantly.
Pay businesses or individuals via ACH or check. We offer custom approval chains for invoices and automatically match them to the correct purchase orders, saving you the frustration of manually searching for POs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/66da09e6f4d7e67835e19b5e_Group%201000006623.png)
Leave the vendor management to us.
Save and manage vendor info all in one place for easy payment scheduling. Use our vendor onboarding links to collect bank details, W-9s, and 1099s without the email back and forth.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/66da0b76da09c220e48367bd_Group%201000008876%20\(1\).png)
Purchase Orders and Petty Cash, all in one place!
Create and approve purchase orders with just a tap of a button.
No more phone tag. Easily create, approve, and track purchase orders on our website or mobile app.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65a74a7b357b6caecf900fa7_Group%201000006580.png)
Ideal for production accountants and execs.
Track crew expenses real-time and generate accounting reports in the format of your choice.
Check expense/receipt status, capture approvals, and generate tax and accounting reports for platforms like Smart Accounting, Extreme Reach, PSL, and many more. No more chasing crew! 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/661ec3c214d5a4dd3bcdb209_Group%201000008516.png)
Stay on budget with our bank integration and instant app notifications.
Connect your cards for seamless receipt matching. No p-cards? No problem. 
We parse bank data to match your receipts with the right transactions. See where money is going real-time, across your crew members and departments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/659f379c7f680ee1fa2d9c58_feature-4.png)
Get notified when your card is swiped or approval is required.
Never lose your receipts with real-time purchase alerts. Approve envelopes and purchase orders on the go.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/659f379ce7f8c478b240a614_feature-6.png)
Track expenses and inventory live for all your productions worldwide.
Easily switch between your productions in one place.
Backdrop lets you add and manage multiple productions all in one place, while keeping the finances separate. Available on both mobile and web.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65a74acf3d1a6b3c5584275c_Group%201000006571.png)
Don't let millions of inventory go to waste.
We track every item you purchase and generate a live inventory list. We can even pull item-level data straight from the source (e.g. Amazon), so you can easily decide whether to reuse, sell, or donate.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/659f379caa81500fbbe8687e_feature-8.png)
It‚Äôs time to say goodbye to chasing receipts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65a760d12c06f245f32e4798_Group%201000006582.png)
**Eliminate 20+ hours of manual work per department per week**
With Backdrop, crew members and accountants don‚Äôt have to spend time on manually entering receipt data and getting approvals. On average, an expense claim takes >45 min to process today. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65c6bf370603d17476283678_Group%201000006556.png)
**Stay on budget by having real-time cash flow visibility**
Productions go over-budget when expenses are not filed on time. Backdrop makes it easy to add receipts and brings your bank and receipt data all in one place. See real-time spend across your entire production and easily compare with your budget. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65c6bf49d6f6ca58bb31b04f_Group%201000006604.png)
**Reduce audits and get tax refunds faster**
Eliminate human errors and missing details using Backdrop‚Äôs smart parsing technology. We generate your tax reports, so you can get your refunds faster. And digitized receipts and expense details make audits a breeze. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65c6c07f7c9db5ac0653ac49_Group%201000006602.png)
**Save millions of dollars of inventory by having item-level data**
See what is being purchased real-time and easily monetize your inventory. Reuse, sell, or donate. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65c6c0902da3082729c47bdd_Group%201000006603.png)
**Don‚Äôt pay for fragmented software**
Backdrop works globally, with your existing bank and accounting systems. Bring your receipt, bank, and PO data all in one place. We support multiple languages and currencies, making financial reporting a breeze no matter where you are. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6519b6fcb8c5579294414926/65c6c0608c7103382793d4b6_Group%201000006606.png)
**Modern software that‚Äôs easy to use**
Tired of using decades old technology? Backdrop is intuitive and easy to use for everyone - purchasers, approvers, and admins.
